decision_conditions: By reason of depth, form and siting along the shared boundary, the proposed single storey rear extensions at ground and first floor levels would appear a dominant and incongruous additions to the original dwelling and out of keeping with the prevailing pattern of development in the area, thereby conflicting with Policies D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's Core Strategy 2012.

By reason of siting and depth, the proposed single storey rear extensions at ground and first floor levels would adversely impact the amenities of neighbouring properties No. 3 and 5 Warwick Road by reason of overbearing appearance and through creating an undue sense of enclosure thereby conflicting with Policies D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8, DM10 and DM12 of the Council's Core Strategy 2012. Further the applicant has failed to demonstrate compliance with BRE Guidelines and the "45 degree rule" regarding day lighting and sun lighting and the guidance set out in the Residential Design SPD 2013.
description: Erection of single-storey rear extension and first floor rear extension
